aiTutor_subtitle: Personalized practice and instant doubt clarification for JEE, NEET, UPSC, and more.
aiTutor_error_fetchQuestion: Failed to fetch question. Please ensure your Python backend server is running.
aiTutor_chatbot_initialMessage: Have a doubt? Ask me anything!
perfDash_subtitle: Here's a detailed breakdown of your results.
careerPlanner_error_generateFailed: Sorry, we couldn't generate your roadmap. Please try again.
emptyState_roadmapText: Your personalized roadmap will appear here...
roadmapDisplay_subtitle: Follow these steps to achieve your career goals. Each step is a building block for your future.
scholarship_subtitle: Find scholarships that match your profile, for studies in India and abroad.
scholarship_error_fetchFailed: Could not find scholarships. Please ensure the backend is running.
scholarship_emptyStateText: Enter your details to find matching scholarships.
userInput_subtitle: Tell us about yourself for a hyper-detailed, actionable career plan.
userInput_interestsPlaceholder: e.g., Machine Learning, Human Biology, Ancient History
userInput_goalsPlaceholder: e.g., Become a Doctor, IAS Officer, Software Engineer
userInput_educationPlaceholder: e.g., B.Tech in CS, MBBS, B.A. in History
userInput_targetPlaceholder: e.g., Samsung, AIIMS Delhi, Civil Services
chatbot_initialMessage: Hi! How can I help you with your career path today?
chatbot_errorMessage: Sorry, I'm having trouble connecting. Please try again later.
support_seo_desc: Get help, find answers to frequently asked questions, and contact the Potho-Prodorshok team.
support_about_subtitle: Your Dream, We Plan. Our mission is to provide students with a clear, actionable path to their career goals using the power of AI.
support_faq_a1: Yes, all core features of our app are completely free. We believe everyone deserves access to quality career guidance.
support_faq_q2: How are the AI recommendations generated?
support_faq_a2: Our platform uses advanced generative AI models, which are trained on vast amounts of educational and career data to provide personalized and relevant suggestions.
support_faq_a3: Absolutely. We take your privacy seriously. We only store your email and hashed password for login purposes. We never share your data with third parties.
policies_seo_desc: Read our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service to understand how we handle your data and our commitment to your privacy and security.
policies_privacy_p1: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it.
policies_privacy_data_email_desc: We collect your email address during signup to create and secure your account.
policies_privacy_data_userInput_desc: The skills, interests, and goals you provide are sent to our AI model to generate personalized results. This data is not stored permanently with your personal identity.
policies_privacy_data_analytics_desc: We use Google Analytics to collect anonymous traffic data to help us improve our service.
policies_privacy_usage_desc: Your data is used solely to provide and improve the services offered by Potho-Prodorshok. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
policies_privacy_storage_desc: Your password is encrypted and securely stored in our database. We take all reasonable measures to protect your information.
policies_terms_p1: By using our website, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
policies_terms_use_desc: You agree not to misuse the service or help anyone else to do so. The service is for personal, non-commercial use only.
policies_terms_disclaimer_desc: The AI-generated content is for informational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional advice. We do not guarantee the accuracy of the generated information.
